content:
Poland will require Russia to explain after the Russian rocket on the night of NATO's airspace on Sunday.

This is stated instatementPolish Foreign Ministry.

“Poland will require explanations from the Russian Federation in connection with the next violation of the country's airspace. First of all, we urge the Russian Federation to end terrorist air attacks against residents and territory of Ukraine, as well as end the war and deal with internal problems of the country, ”the Polish Foreign Ministry said in a statement.

The Polish Foreign Ministry spokesman Pavel Vronsky expressed his condolences to the victims of Russian bombardment and their loved ones.

"Poland condemns all forms of terrorism and attempts of power viewing of borders," he emphasized.

As reportedArmyinform, on the night of March 24 at 4.23 in the morning, there was a violation of the Polish airspace by one of the maneuverable missiles launched by the Aviation of Dental Action of Russia.

RocketenteredIn the airspace of Poland in the village of the village, he wedded in the Lublin Voivodeship. She was there for 39 seconds.
title: Poland will require explanations from Russia through a rocket that has broken airspace
